OOC: Here is my feeble at a recovery, I am making a new Character...


BIC: A Pod, which as recently crashed, malfunctioning do to the crash, solar 
radiation, and Magnetic shifts, has only been able to activate is life scanner 
for a cover. As it scans a small group of Neanderthals, a hunting party, 
inspects the crash. The Scanner picks up the "Cavemen" and the robot Replicates, 
It emerges, 7 feet tall, tal enough to stand out, and yet, short enough to 
blend in. A little to muscular to be completely natural, the group, weary at 
first, keeps it's distance, As the figure emerges it carries with it a great 
hammer, He stomps his way to the group and commences with some grunts and hoots. The 
group slowly accepts him into teir group, he aids them on the hunting party 
bagging a mammoth. HE stays with the group eventually becoming their "cheif" 
They part into the jungle once again to feast on thier prey.

--part1_44.3531a302.2c98ea27_boundary
